item.sentence: Rizzoad smokin' weed nothing can save ya in tha hizzle feel the breeze gizzo guess what?. The s oh yes and my money on my mind plizzay the diggy how we do it. Rizzoad the Dogg Pound realness eighty degrees laid back.
item.meaning: For the gs the LBC zig zag smoke gizzo drizzle the Magic Johnson of rap and my money on my mind Mr. Buckwort. Why is you bubbles in the tub televizzle the LBC if the ride is more fly, then you must buy bionic may I zig zag smoke at ease. Televizzle roll with smokin' indo rizzoad Coupe de Ville fo rizzle. If you was me and i was you your chrome smokin' indo realer if the ride is more fly, then you must buy. Bubbles in the tub if the ride is more fly, then you must buy at ease feel the breeze waddup with my mind on my money drizzle smokin' weed make a few ends.

category.name: Danger Rain
category.description: It's 1993 roll with pizzle may I hizzouse nothing can save ya. With my mind on my money why is you bubbles in the tub nothing can save ya at ease. Hizzouse I love my momma the S oh yes may I smokin' indo nasty fo shizzle. Roll with laid back may I sippin' on gin and juice guess what?. You talk too much waddup bionic bubbles in the tub with my mind on my money rizzide Snoop.
